column4: Hello, Anyone know a good opensource rational rose alternative provided by ubuntu?
Does anyone even see my messages? Either no one sees my messages or no one is ever interested in answering them
Someone at least say type Zikiti so I'll know you see my messages
So someone responded... but do you have any suggestions for a rational rose alternative?
ah... found bouml in the repository but... it's terrible
thanks but not exactly what I'm looking for... take a look at this site http://www.osalt.com/rational-rose
